main_tasks:
•  Lead effort to design, architect, and build our data platform to support different methods to ingest and process data; including events, legacy systems, and third party APIs.

• Design, implement and maintain end-to-end data pipelines from raw data sources to presentation.

• Own the technical vision and roadmap for our data platform to meet the data needs of different stakeholders across multiple business units.

• Partner with a product owner to develop a product vision and roadmap 

• Lead, mentor, and grow a small team of high-performing data engineers

• Collaborate with the Engineering Team, Analytics, subject matter exports, and department leaders to understand, analyze, build and deliver new data models, processes, and reports

• Establish and drive adoption of best practices for data engineering, component re-use, architecture and technical standards 

• Ensure data quality and compliance with reporting and regulatory standards

• Manage daily operations for the Data Platform team, including projects, priorities, and user requests (with the help from a scrum master / agile coach) 

• Align with broader goals of the business and IT strategy

• Recruit, train, motivate and evaluate his/her team to ensure that the department has the necessary skill base and potential
requirements:
•Degree in information technology or related fields (computer science; information science; software engineering)

• Degree in Engineering with additional IT qualifications or equivalent work experience

• Relevant project management qualification (ASP, PHP, AJAX, Java, others) or equivalent work experience

• Experienced in managing large amounts of data from multiple platforms into actionable insights, utilizing data to build strategy and clearly communicate strategies to internal and external stakeholders

• Preferred if able to create modern data pipelines using tools such as AWS Kinesis and Lambda, StreamSets, etc.

• Preferred if able to develop SQL structures that support high volumes and scalability using RDBMS’s such as SQL Server, MySQL, Aurora, etc.

• Preferred if able to model and design modern data structures, SQL/NoSQL databases, Data Lakes, Cloud Data Warehouse (SnowFlake preferred)

• Python programming experience preferred

• Prefer experience engineering solutions in AWS

• AWS certification preferred but not required prior to hiring
jd:
Data Platform architect is responsible for driving and implementing the strategy and tactics to grow and evolve our data platform that is collecting data from a variety of sources and used across the entire business. This is a key role that will have a big impact on the future priorities of this organization.


주요업무
•  Lead effort to design, architect, and build our data platform to support different methods to ingest and process data; including events, legacy systems, and third party APIs.

• Design, implement and maintain end-to-end data pipelines from raw data sources to presentation.

• Own the technical vision and roadmap for our data platform to meet the data needs of different stakeholders across multiple business units.

• Partner with a product owner to develop a product vision and roadmap 

• Lead, mentor, and grow a small team of high-performing data engineers

• Collaborate with the Engineering Team, Analytics, subject matter exports, and department leaders to understand, analyze, build and deliver new data models, processes, and reports

• Establish and drive adoption of best practices for data engineering, component re-use, architecture and technical standards 

• Ensure data quality and compliance with reporting and regulatory standards

• Manage daily operations for the Data Platform team, including projects, priorities, and user requests (with the help from a scrum master / agile coach) 

• Align with broader goals of the business and IT strategy

• Recruit, train, motivate and evaluate his/her team to ensure that the department has the necessary skill base and potential

자격요건
•Degree in information technology or related fields (computer science; information science; software engineering)

• Degree in Engineering with additional IT qualifications or equivalent work experience

• Relevant project management qualification (ASP, PHP, AJAX, Java, others) or equivalent work experience

• Experienced in managing large amounts of data from multiple platforms into actionable insights, utilizing data to build strategy and clearly communicate strategies to internal and external stakeholders

• Preferred if able to create modern data pipelines using tools such as AWS Kinesis and Lambda, StreamSets, etc.

• Preferred if able to develop SQL structures that support high volumes and scalability using RDBMS’s such as SQL Server, MySQL, Aurora, etc.

• Preferred if able to model and design modern data structures, SQL/NoSQL databases, Data Lakes, Cloud Data Warehouse (SnowFlake preferred)

• Python programming experience preferred

• Prefer experience engineering solutions in AWS

• AWS certification preferred but not required prior to hiring

혜택 및 복지
• 건강보험료 개인 부담분 회사 지원
• 자녀 학자금 제공 (유치원부터 제공)
• 체력단련비 및 Refresh휴가 
기타 경쟁력 있는 복리후생 제공
